last_updated_date.description: When the story was last updated (RFC3339-formatted).

canonical_url.description: The fully qualified URL to the story.

trait_credited.json.title: Credit trait
trait_credited.json.description: Trait that captures the need to attribute ownership or authorship to content.

credits.description: An array of people/groups attributed to this content.

credit.json.title: Credit for a piece of content.
credit.json.description: Models attribution to an individual or group for contribution towards some content item.

org.description: The (optional) organization the contributor belongs to.

role.description: The role the contributor played in the content.

description.description: A description/short bio of the contributor.

url.description: A url to some deeper set of information about the contributor.

social_links.description: A list of social links (twitter, facebook, etc) for this contributor.

image.json.title: An image.
image.json.description: Holds attributes of an ANS image component.

media.json.title: A media object.
media.json.description: Holds common attributes of ANS Media objects.

title.description: The title of the media object.

taxonomy.description: A collection of metadata, keywords, etc. describing this media.

content.json.title: A content object.
content.json.description: Holds common attributes of ANS Content objects.

trait_copyrighted.json.title: Copyright information
trait_copyrighted.json.description: Defines the structure of copyright information, as applied to content.

copyright.description: The copyright notice, e.g. '(c) 2015 The Washington Post, Inc.'

taxonomy.json.title: Taxonomy
taxonomy.json.description: Holds the collection of metadata, keywords, etc that describe content.

keyword.json.title: Keyword
keyword.json.description: Models a keyword used in describing a piece of content.

keyword.description: The keyword used to describe/categorize a piece of content

score.description: An arbitrary weighting to give the keyword

frequency.description: An optional count of the frequency of the keyword as it appears in the content it describes

social.json.description: A tuple of social media information (e.g. Facebook url, Twitter handle, etc)

site.description: The name of the social media site (e.g. twitter, facebook, etc)

url.description: The profile/account page to link to on the site
